attributes.action: Ban the two day course for the london underground.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ban the two day course for the london underground so i doen't inconveience passengers who need it on a day to day basis.

rejection.details: It is not clear from your e-petition as to what exactly you are refering to - please consider re-drafting.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
